definitions.text: the act of furnishing an equivalent person or thing in the place of another
examples: replacing the star will not be easy

definitions.text: someone who takes the place of another person
an event in which one thing is substituted for another
examples: the replacement of lost blood by a transfusion of donor blood

definitions.text: a person or thing that takes or can take the place of another
filling again by supplying what has been used up
a person who follows next in order
